NL: Find the total revenue generated by campaigns that were successful, defined as campaigns with an actual spent less than the budget.
Query: SELECT SUM(revenue_generated) FROM campaigns WHERE actual_spent < budget AND campaign_status = 'successful';

NL: List the product display names and their associated supplier reference IDs for all products that are currently active.
Query: SELECT p.product_display_name, p.associated_supplier_reference_id FROM products p WHERE p.active_product_status = TRUE;

NL: Retrieve the campaign name, start date, and end date for all email campaigns that have an open rate greater than 20%.
Query: SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE email_open_rate > 20;

NL: Find all female customers above 40 years old with more than 1000 loyalty points.
Query: SELECT * FROM customerinfo WHERE person_gender = 'F' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, person_date_of_birth)) > 40 AND person_loyalty_points > 1000;
